contents: Sets new points. This overrides the previous points.

An array of geographical points [longitude, latitude].

contents: A class that provides a ruler control on the map.
documentation.contentsRaw: A class that provides a ruler control on the map.
Destroys the control and the ruler.
Returns the container of the control.
Returns the position of the control.
Sets the position of the control.

contents: Toggle control. The same as clicking the button.
documentation.contentsRaw: Toggle control. The same as clicking the button.

contents:
Example:

const control = new mapgl.RulerControl(map, {{ position: 'centerRight' }});
control.getRuler().setPoints([
    [55.31878, 25.23584],
    [55.35878, 25.23584],
    [55.35878, 25.26584],
]);

Example:

const control = new mapgl.RulerControl(map, {{ position: 'centerRight' }});
control.getRuler().setPoints([
    [55.31878, 25.23584],
    [55.35878, 25.23584],
    [55.35878, 25.26584],
]);
